system thank you earner I'm really excited to be here I'm going to tell you folks a little bit about pars and how
AWS has helped us build a really flexible platform that makes mobile developers lives much much
easier so the story of parse begins in early 2011 my co-founders and I were
working on various mobile projects trying to check out the mobile uh Revolution and we found that mobile

it has to work on every platform and then finally get to your
stuff the the code the part of your app that is actually different from every other app in the app store your users

frustrating so we decided to fix this for mobile developers everywhere we ditched our apps and we built a platform
so that's what parse is all about make it really dead simple to build great crossplatform mobile apps without
